name: Go4Funding
overview:
Go4Funding is a new online network that brings entrepreneurs, existing business owners, and investors together from around the world.

Entrepreneurs can post their capital requirements and business ideas for discussion while viewing various active funding options and potential leads. Investors, on the other hand, who are looking for business opportunities, can locate thousands of potential investments from across the globe. In addition, all parties can freely exchange ideas, advertise, and obtain online support through posted forums and educational materials.

Online membership is currently free of charge. Since the launch in March 2007, membership to Go4Funding has grown to over 4000 users, with over 3800 active funding requests. Members can also rate business ideas, browse through the most viewed postings, and share postings with non-members.
